ezxpns.data
Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
  ezxpns.data.Storable
      ezxpns.data.DataManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReportGenerator.DataProvider, SummaryGenerator.DataProvider, TargetManager.DataProvider
public class DataManager
extends Storable
implements ReportGenerator.DataProvider, TargetManager.DataProvider, SummaryGenerator.DataProvider

Author:
yyjhao A wrapper containing all data
with some helper functions to query both types
Everything here is handled by StorageManager to save to file
Remember to add transient if the data is not meant to be persistent

Field Summary
private  DataManager.CombinedRecordsQueryHandler _combined
          Note that this is a combination of both income and expense record manager,
so it need not be persistent, since all its data is from the two manager
